## To Build
```bash
cd plugindir
scl enable devtoolset-9 'make'
scl enable devtoolset-9 "make clean && make"
```

## NodeIDs
#### RixPattern
```
3000010 DxCustomAOV
3000020 DxFoam
3000021 DxGeometryAOVs
3000022 DxTo
3000030 DxGrade
3000031 DxManifold2D
3000032 DxHoudiniOcean
3000050 DxTexFile
```
#### RixProjection
```
3000110 DxBeyondScreen
3000120 DxFisheye
3000130 DxOmniDirectionalStereo
```
